00038 RDK2_FACTORY(RImage);
00039     
00040 void RImage::initBuffer(int w, int h, Type t, void* buf, unsigned char fillValue, bool freeOldBuffer)
00041 {
00042     this->type = t;
00043     this->width = w;
00044     this->height = h;
00045     this->bpp = getBytesPerPixel(t);
00046     
00047     if (freeOldBuffer && buffer) {
00048         delete[] buffer;
00049         delete[] rows;
00050     }
00051     
00052     this->bufferSize = width * height * bpp;
00053     this->dataSize = this->bufferSize;
00054     this->buffer = new unsigned char[bufferSize];
00055 
00056     if (buf) memcpy(buffer, buf, bufferSize);
00057     else memset(buffer, fillValue, bufferSize);
00058     
00059     size_t rowSize = w * bpp;
00060     rows = new unsigned char*[height];
00061     for (size_t y = 0; y < height; y++) rows[y] = buffer + rowSize * y;
00062 }
00063 
00064 RImage::RImage(): buffer(0)
00065 {
00066     initBuffer(1, 1, RImage::C8, 0, 0);
00067 }
00068 
00069 RImage::RImage(int w, int h, Type type, unsigned char* buf): buffer(0)
00070 {
00071     initBuffer(w, h, type, buf, 0);
00072 }
00073 
00074 RImage::RImage(const RImage& img): buffer(0)
00075 {
00076     initBuffer(img.width, img.height, img.type, img.buffer, 0);
00077 }
00078 
00079 size_t RImage::getBytesPerPixel(RImage::Type t)
00080 {
00081     switch (t) {
00082         case RGB32: return 4;
00083         case RGB24: return 3;
00084         case JPEG: return 3;    // XXX
00085         case GREY: return 1;
00086         case C8: return 1;
00087         case YUYV: return 2;
00088     }
00089     return 0;
00090 }
00091 
00092 RDK2::Object* RImage::clone() const 
00093 {
00094     RImage* ri = new RImage(*this);
00095     return ri;
00096 }
00097 
00098 RImage& RImage::operator=(const RImage& img)
00099 {
00100     initBuffer(img.width, img.height, img.type, img.buffer, 0);
00101     return *this;
00102 }
00103 
00104 RImage::~RImage()
00105 {
00106     delete[] buffer;
00107     delete[] rows;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void RImage::setSizeAndType(size_t w, size_t h, Type t)
00111 {
00112     if (w == width && h == height && t == type) return;
00113     initBuffer(w, h, t, 0, 0);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void RImage::fillBuffer(unsigned char fillValue)
00117 {
00118     memset(buffer, fillValue, bufferSize);
00119 }
00120 
00121 void RImage::canvasResize(size_t w, size_t h, size_t x, size_t y, unsigned char fillValue)
00122 {
00123     size_t begin_u,begin_v,end_u,end_v,begin_nu,begin_nv,end_nu,end_nv;
00124     
00125     // the area of the original image to be copied
00126     begin_u = std::min(width, std::max((size_t) 0, x));
00127     end_u = std::max((size_t) 0, std::min(width, x + w));
00128     begin_v = std::min(height, std::max((size_t) 0, y));
00129     end_v = std::max((size_t) 0, std::min(height, y + h));
00130     
00131     // the area in the new canvas onto which the old image must be copied
00132     begin_nu = begin_u-x;
00133     end_nu = end_u-x;
00134     begin_nv = begin_v-y;
00135     end_nv = end_v-y;
00136 
00137     unsigned char* oldbuf = this->buffer;
00138     unsigned char** oldrows = this->rows;
00139     
00140     initBuffer(w, h, this->type, 0, fillValue, false); 
00141 
00142     for (size_t i = begin_nv; i < end_nv; i++)
00143         // memcpy(rows[i] + begin_nu * size, oldrows[i+anch_v] + begin_u * size, (end_u - begin_u) * size);
00144         memcpy((void*) (buffer[i * width * bpp] + begin_nu * bpp),
00145             (void*) (oldbuf[i * y * bpp] + begin_u * bpp),
00146             (end_u - begin_u) * bpp);
00147 
00148     delete[] oldbuf;
00149     delete[] oldrows;
00150 }
00151 
00152 void RImage::imageResize(size_t w, size_t h)
00153 {
00154     if (w == width && h == height) return;
00155     unsigned char* oldbuf = buffer;
00156     unsigned char** oldrows = rows;
00157     size_t oldw = width, oldh = height;
00158 
00159     initBuffer(w, h, this->type, 0, 0);
00160 
00161     for (size_t y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00162         for (size_t x = 0; x < width; x++) {
00163             for (size_t i = 0; i < bpp; i++) {
00164                 rows[y][x * bpp + i] = oldrows[y * oldh/height][x * bpp * oldw/width + i];
00165             }
00166         }
00167     }
00168 
00169     delete[] oldbuf;
00170     delete[] oldrows;
00171 }
